item.title: Minerval Arts
item.description: I would pay money to see good conversations happening because good conversations are absent in our world. I believe other people would also be interested in paying money to see good conversations happening. Gandhi taught to be the change you wish to see and my goal is to create a place where good conversations happen. I have created a Patreon account which allows subscribers to gain attention on my Discord server.
